Smiles after causing the chain to spool down, showing confidence in his action.
Is shot twice in the back by Cleets #3 and #4, drops his gun, and falls into a broken heap.
Despite being shot, he manages to flick his eyes to the 9MM and inches his hand toward it, attempting to defend himself.
Runs out of ammo and is unable to stop Jonas from approaching him.
Shares a tender moment with Liza, expressing love and a lucky charm memory despite dire circumstances.
Accepts help and comfort from Liza, showing vulnerability and trust.
Remains calm and ready to face imminent death, showing mental composure under extreme pressure.
Instructs Liza to retrieve a bloodstained $100 bill from his pocket, indicating presence of mind and attachment to a 'lucky charm' even in dire circumstances.
Engages in light, somewhat humorous conversation about the changed portrait on the bill despite being gravely injured, showing mental clarity and wit.
Does not attempt to escape or fight back when threatened with execution, instead waits passively.
Squeezes his eyes shut, overwhelmed by the situation.
Looks defiantly at agents despite being weak and bandaged.
Appears overwhelmed and physically incapacitated, requiring defibrillation and hospitalization.
Despite severe injury and weakness, maintains a defiant look when confronted by agents.
Insists on seeing 'her' despite restrictions, showing concern for her well-being.
Calls Flip the closest thing he has to a friend and seeks his honest opinion.
Responds to Flip's bluntness with no visible anger, indicating tolerance.
Uses harsh language ('screw you') when denied access, showing frustration but also sincerity in his demands.
Negotiates terms before agreeing to cooperate, insisting on seeing someone important to him.
Refuses to cooperate without conditions, showing some control over the situation despite being threatened.
Expresses doubt about his own sanity when asking Flip if he thinks he's crazy.
Uses binoculars to carefully observe Liza's progress and assesses her safety accurately.
Shows emotional involvement and concern but maintains focus on the task at hand.
